thread.section_title: Flashbay Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Flashbay | www.flashbay.com | 2 of 510
thread.title: Doug Rawady

author: Doug Rawady
title: Doug Rawady
text: From my initial inquiry nearly a month ago, to the receipt of my order a few days back, my experience in dealing with Flashbay was top-of-the-line! Communications were prompt and professional, the price Quote: s were highly competitive and the flash drives (when they finally arrived) were well-packed and looked great. Would do business with this company again in a heartbeat! Count me as a satisfied customer.
